TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed SocketOptionName extends System.Enum

summary.span: 定義組態選項名稱。

span.span: Defines configuration option names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉型別定義的每個名稱組態選項。The enumeration defines the name of each configuration option. 可以使用設定通訊端方法。Sockets can be configured with the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會使用這個列舉型別，來設定通訊端選項。The following code example uses this enumeration to set socket options. [!code-cpp[Socket_Socket_Options#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Socket_Options/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Socket_Socket_Options#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Socket_Options/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Socket_Socket_Options#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Socket_Socket_Options/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName AcceptConnection = int32(2)
AcceptConnection = 2

summary.span: 通訊端正在接聽。

span.span: The socket is listening.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName AddMembership = int32(12)
AddMembership = 12

summary.span: 加入 IP 群組成員資格。

span.span: Add an IP group membership.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName AddSourceMembership = int32(15)
AddSourceMembership = 15

summary.span: 聯結來源群組。

span.span: Join a source group.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName BlockSource = int32(17)
BlockSource = 17

summary.span: 封鎖來自來源的資料。

span.span: Block data from a source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Broadcast = int32(32)
Broadcast = 32

summary.span: 允許在通訊端上傳送廣播訊息。

span.span: Permit sending broadcast messages on the socket.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName BsdUrgent = int32(2)
BsdUrgent = 2

summary.span: 使用 RFC-1222 中定義的緊急資料。

span.span: Use urgent data as defined in RFC-1222.

summary.span: 這個選項只能設定一次，一旦設定就無法關閉。

span.span: This option can be set only once; after it is set, it cannot be turned off.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ChecksumCoverage = int32(20)
ChecksumCoverage = 20

summary.span: 設定或取得 UDP 總和檢查碼涵蓋範圍。

span.span: Set or get the UDP checksum coverage.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Debug = int32(1)
Debug = 1

summary.span: 記錄偵錯資訊。

span.span: Record debugging information.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName DontFragment = int32(14)
DontFragment = 14

summary.span: 不要將 IP 資料包分成片段。

span.span: Do not fragment IP datagrams.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName DontLinger = int32(-129)
DontLinger = -129

summary.span: 立即關閉通訊端。

span.span: Close the socket gracefully without lingering.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName DontRoute = int32(16)
DontRoute = 16

summary.span: 不進行路由，直接將封包傳送至介面位址。

span.span: Do not route; send the packet directly to the interface addresses.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName DropMembership = int32(13)
DropMembership = 13

summary.span: 捨棄 IP 群組成員資格。

span.span: Drop an IP group membership.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName DropSourceMembership = int32(16)
DropSourceMembership = 16

summary.span: 捨棄來源群組。

span.span: Drop a source group.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Error = int32(4103)
Error = 4103

summary.span: 取得錯誤狀態並清除。

span.span: Gets the error status and clear.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ExclusiveAddressUse = int32(-5)
ExclusiveAddressUse = -5

summary.span: 啟用將繫結至獨佔存取的通訊端。

span.span: Enables a socket to be bound for exclusive access.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Expedited = int32(2)
Expedited = 2

summary.span: 使用 RFC-1222 中定義的已傳輸資料。

span.span: Use expedited data as defined in RFC-1222.

summary.span: 這個選項只能設定一次，一旦設定就無法關閉。

span.span: This option can be set only once; after it is set, it cannot be turned off.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName HeaderIncluded = int32(2)
HeaderIncluded = 2

summary.span: 表示應用程式將提供輸出資料包的 IP 標頭。

span.span: Indicates that the application provides the IP header for outgoing datagrams.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName HopLimit = int32(21)
HopLimit = 21

summary.span: 指定網際網路通訊協定第 6 版 (IPv6) 封包的最大路由器躍點數。

span.span: Specifies the maximum number of router hops for an Internet Protocol version 6 (IPv6) packet.

summary.span: 這與網際網路通訊協定第 4 版的存留時間 (TTL) 類似。

span.span: This is similar to Time to Live (TTL) for Internet Protocol version 4.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName IPOptions = int32(1)
IPOptions = 1

summary.span: 指定要插入輸出資料包的 IP 選項。

span.span: Specifies the IP options to be inserted into outgoing datagrams.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName IPProtectionLevel = int32(23)
IPProtectionLevel = 23

summary.span: 讓 IPv6 通訊端限制在指定範圍的值，例如相同連結本機或網站本機之前置詞的位址。這個通訊端選項可以讓應用程式對 IPv6 通訊端設定存取限制。

span.span: Enables restriction of a IPv6 socket to a specified scope, such as addresses with the same link local or site local prefix.This socket option enables applications to place access restrictions on IPv6 sockets.

summary.span: 這類限制可以讓應用程式在私人 LAN 上執行，簡便又穩當地強化應用程式對外部攻擊的抵禦。

span.span: Such restrictions enable an application running on a private LAN to simply and robustly harden itself against external attacks.

summary.span: 這個通訊端選項可放大或縮小接聽通訊端的範圍，根據需要啟用公用和私用使用者的無限制存取，或視需要限制成僅可存取相同的站台。

span.span: This socket option widens or narrows the scope of a listening socket, enabling unrestricted access from public and private users when appropriate, or restricting access only to the same site, as required.

summary.span: 這個通訊端選項已定義 列舉中所指定的保護層級。

span.span: This socket option has defined protection levels specified in the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName IpTimeToLive = int32(4)
IpTimeToLive = 4

summary.span: 設定 IP 標頭的存留時間欄位。

span.span: Set the IP header Time-to-Live field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName IPv6Only = int32(27)
IPv6Only = 27

summary.span: 指出針對 AF_INET6 位址家族建立的通訊端是否限制僅供 IPv6 通訊使用。

span.span: Indicates if a socket created for the AF_INET6 address family is restricted to IPv6 communications only.

summary.span: 針對 AF_INET6 位址家族建立的通訊端，可同時提供 IPv6 及 IPv4 通訊使用。

span.span: Sockets created for the AF_INET6 address family may be used for both IPv6 and IPv4 communications.

summary.span: 某些應用程式可能希望將使用限制在針對 AF_INET6 位址家族所建立的通訊端，以及僅提供 IPv6 通訊使用。

span.span: Some applications may want to restrict their use of a socket created for the AF_INET6 address family to IPv6 communications only.

summary.span: 如果這個值不是零 (Windows 上的預設值)，則會使用針對 AF_INET6 位址家族建立的通訊端，並且只用來傳送和接收 IPv6 封包。

span.span: When this value is non-zero (the default on Windows), a socket created for the AF_INET6 address family can be used to send and receive IPv6 packets only.

summary.span: 如果這個值為零，則針對 AF_INET6 位址家族建立的通訊端，可用來傳送和接收往返 IPv6 或 IPv4 位址的封包。

span.span: When this value is zero, a socket created for the AF_INET6 address family can be used to send and receive packets to and from an IPv6 address or an IPv4 address.

summary.span: 請注意，必須使用 IPv4 對應位址，才能發揮與 IPv4 位址互動的能力。

span.span: Note that the ability to interact with an IPv4 address requires the use of IPv4 mapped addresses.

summary.span: Windows Vista (含) 以後版本支援這個通訊端選項。

span.span: This socket option is supported on Windows Vista or later.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName KeepAlive = int32(8)
KeepAlive = 8

summary.span: 使用 Keep-Alive。

span.span: Use keep-alives.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Linger = int32(128)
Linger = 128

summary.span: 如果有未傳送的資料，則延遲關閉。

span.span: Linger on close if unsent data is present.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName MaxConnections = int32(2147483647)
MaxConnections = 2147483647

summary.span: 不支援，如果使用則會擲回 。

span.span: Not supported; will throw a if used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName MulticastInterface = int32(9)
MulticastInterface = 9

summary.span: 設定用於輸出多點傳送封包的介面。

span.span: Set the interface for outgoing multicast packets.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName MulticastLoopback = int32(11)
MulticastLoopback = 11

summary.span: IP 多點傳送回送。

span.span: An IP multicast loopback.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName MulticastTimeToLive = int32(10)
MulticastTimeToLive = 10

summary.span: IP 多點傳送存留時間。

span.span: An IP multicast Time to Live.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName NoChecksum = int32(1)
NoChecksum = 1

summary.span: 在總和檢查碼設定為零的情況下傳送 UDP 資料包。

span.span: Send UDP datagrams with checksum set to zero.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName NoDelay = int32(1)
NoDelay = 1

summary.span: 停用用於傳送聯合的 Nagle 演算法。

span.span: Disables the Nagle algorithm for send coalescing.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName OutOfBandInline = int32(256)
OutOfBandInline = 256

summary.span: 在一般資料流中接收頻外 (Out-of-Band) 資料。

span.span: Receives out-of-band data in the normal data stream.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName PacketInformation = int32(19)
PacketInformation = 19

summary.span: 傳回所接收封包的相關資訊。

span.span: Return information about received packets.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ReceiveBuffer = int32(4098)
ReceiveBuffer = 4098

summary.span: 指定保留給接收的每一通訊端緩衝區總空間。

span.span: Specifies the total per-socket buffer space reserved for receives.

summary.span: 這與最大訊息大小或 TCP 視窗大小無關。

span.span: This is unrelated to the maximum message size or the size of a TCP window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ReceiveLowWater = int32(4100)
ReceiveLowWater = 4100

summary.span: 指定 作業的下限標準。

span.span: Specifies the low water mark for operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ReceiveTimeout = int32(4102)
ReceiveTimeout = 4102

summary.span: 接收逾時。這個選項只適用於同步方法，它對 方法之類的非同步方法沒有作用。

span.span: Receive a time-out. This option applies only to synchronous methods; it has no effect on asynchronous methods such as the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ReuseAddress = int32(4)
ReuseAddress = 4

summary.span: 允許要繫結至已使用中位址的通訊端。

span.span: Allows the socket to be bound to an address that is already in use.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName ReuseUnicastPort = int32(12295)
ReuseUnicastPort = 12295

summary.span: 指出系統應該延遲連出連線的暫時性連接埠配置。

span.span: Indicates that the system should defer ephemeral port allocation for outbound connections.

summary.span: 這相當於使用 Winsock2 SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT 通訊端選項。

span.span: This is equivalent to using the Winsock2 SO_REUSE_UNICASTPORT socket option.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName SendBuffer = int32(4097)
SendBuffer = 4097

summary.span: 指定保留給傳送的每一通訊端緩衝區總空間。

span.span: Specifies the total per-socket buffer space reserved for sends.

summary.span: 這與最大訊息大小或 TCP 視窗大小無關。

span.span: This is unrelated to the maximum message size or the size of a TCP window.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName SendLowWater = int32(4099)
SendLowWater = 4099

summary.span: 指定指定 作業的下限標準。

span.span: Specifies the low water mark for operations.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName SendTimeout = int32(4101)
SendTimeout = 4101

summary.span: 傳送逾時。這個選項只適用於同步方法，它對 方法之類的非同步方法沒有作用。

span.span: Send a time-out. This option applies only to synchronous methods; it has no effect on asynchronous methods such as the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName Type = int32(4104)
Type = 4104

summary.span: 取得通訊端類型。

span.span: Gets the socket type.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName TypeOfService = int32(3)
TypeOfService = 3

summary.span: 變更服務欄位的 IP 標頭類型。

span.span: Change the IP header type of the service field.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName UnblockSource = int32(18)
UnblockSource = 18

summary.span: 取消封鎖先前所封鎖的來源。

span.span: Unblock a previously blocked source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName UpdateAcceptContext = int32(28683)
UpdateAcceptContext = 28683

summary.span: 藉由使用現有通訊端的屬性，更新已接受之通訊端的屬性。

span.span: Updates an accepted socket's properties by using those of an existing socket.

summary.span: 這相當於使用 Winsock2 SO_UPDATE_ACCEPT_CONTEXT 通訊端選項，而且只有連線導向的通訊端才支援。

span.span: This is equivalent to using the Winsock2 SO_UPDATE_ACCEPT_CONTEXT socket option and is supported only on connection-oriented sockets.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName UpdateConnectContext = int32(28688)
UpdateConnectContext = 28688

summary.span: 藉由使用現有通訊端的屬性，更新已連接之通訊端的屬性。

span.span: Updates a connected socket's properties by using those of an existing socket.

summary.span: 這相當於使用 Winsock2 SO_UPDATE_CONNECT_CONTEXT 通訊端選項，而且只有連線導向的通訊端才支援。

span.span: This is equivalent to using the Winsock2 SO_UPDATE_CONNECT_CONTEXT socket option and is supported only on connection-oriented sockets.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Net.Sockets.SocketOptionName UseLoopback = int32(64)
UseLoopback = 64

summary.span: 盡可能不使用硬體。

span.span: Bypass hardware when possible.
